items.title: Amazon is paying ~16x Microsoft's price per OpenAI percentage point, while getting none of Microsoft's exclusives, showing the cost of being late in AI (Om Malik/On my Om)
items.title_en: Amazon is paying ~16x Microsoft's price per OpenAI percentage point, while getting none of Microsoft's exclusives, showing the cost of being late in AI (Om Malik/On my Om)
items.title_zh: 亚马逊为每个 OpenAI 个百分点支付了约 16 倍于微软的价格，但没有获得微软的任何独家产品，这显示了在人工智能领域迟到的成本（Om Malik/On my Om）
